article_title: SC hospitals, consumers caught in Obamacare tug-of-war
article_text: SC hospital executives estimate that up to 70,000 health insurance customers in SC could lose their coverage if the US Supreme Court rules federal subsidies are unconstitutional because the state did not set up its own insurance exchange.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Columbia, SC, politics, affordable health care, obamacare, nikki haley, vincent sheheen, democrat, republican, providence hospital, palmetto health, medicaid, medicare, hospitals, poor, low income
